evidence.claim: Echelon IT utilizes AWS for hosting services and data management.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations across all its healthcare technology services.
Echelon IT referenced X12 for health insurance transactions in their API documentation.
The integration framework includes standards like HL7 and FHIR for healthcare interoperability.

icp.icp_reason: Offers healthcare tech with X12 compliance, indicating a use case for API data exchange.
